title: Curtis Samuel - Wikipedia
snippet: Samuel signed a three-year, $34.5 million contract with the Washington Football Team on March 18, 2021. By signing with the Commanders, he was reunited with his college roommate, Terry McLaurin. He was placed on the active/physically unable to perform (PUP) list at the start of training camp ...
